item.title: Europe Is Extinguishing Itself
item.description: It’s not just that European nations aren’t having children. They’re increasingly preventing the children they do have from being born.

item.title: Ed Feulner, 1941–2025
item.description: His passing is a loss for the movement he did so much to build.

item.title: The Whimsy of Don and Audrey Wood
item.description: This husband-and-wife team has produced a treasure trove of picture books.

item.title: Why the Iranian Regime Is Still Uniquely Dangerous
item.description: The Islamic Republic of Iran is motivated by a desire to bring about the end times and usher in an everlasting Islamic imperium.

item.title: Democratic Spokesmen Have the Easiest Job in America
item.description: They don’t even have to get out of bed; someone in the press is already hard at work for them.
